My Work

Check out some of my projects

Note on Project Showcase

Many of the projects I've had the privilege to work on involve developing applications for internal networks, particularly in educational settings using the Symfony framework. Due to the nature of these projects, they are not publicly accessible. However, I would like to share a general overview of the types of challenges I tackled and the skills I applied:

  • Application Data Management: Skillfully modified existing application data to align with client specifications, ensuring that each application met evolving business needs and user requirements.
  • Feature Development: Innovated and implemented new features for existing applications, enhancing functionality and user experience, while adhering to best practices in software development.
  • Application Upgrades: Expertly updated legacy Symfony applications to newer versions, compatible with current PHP and MySQL standards. This involved ensuring smooth transitions, maintaining data integrity, and improving system performance and security.

WordPress Development

These sites were developed using custom themes and plugins catered to specific needs. They use a variation of custom Divi modules or WP gutenberg blocks. Each site utilizes custom post types and taxonomies created either manually with PHP code or using ACF.
